targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("xact_commit"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(last("xact_rollback"), 1s) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg(((c - c_lag) + (r - r_lag)) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as tps
from (
        select 
          (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as r, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as r_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_stats' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and r >= r_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.description: Queries Per Second based on pg_stat_statements.calls

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("calls"), 1s) FROM "stat_statements_calls" WHERE $timeFilter AND "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ GROUP BY time(10m) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as qps
from (
        select 
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'stat_statements_calls' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: QPS

panels.description: Approximate value based on pg_stat_statements total_time / calls

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("total_time"), 1h) / non_negative_derivative(last("calls"), 1h) FROM "stat_statements_calls" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
$__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag))

from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'stat_statements_calls' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Query runtime

targets.query: SELECT "load_5"  FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg(nb) as "# Sessions"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'numbackends')::int8 as nb,
          time
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_stats' and $__timeFilter(time)
) x
group by 1
order by 1

targets.query: SELECT spread("temp_bytes") FROM "db_stats" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg(case when tb-tb_lag > 0 then (tb-tb_lag) / (etime - lag_etime) else 0 end) as "Temp bytes (1h rate)"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'temp_bytes')::int8 as tb, lag((data->>'temp_bytes')::int8) over w as tb_lag,
          (extract(epoch from time))::int8 as etime,
          (lag(extract(epoch from time)) over w)::int8 as lag_etime,
          time
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_stats' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where tb >= tb_lag
group by 1
order by 1

targets.query: SELECT (last("size_b")  - first("size_b"))*4 FROM "db_size" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15m) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  max(last_value-first_value) as size_diff
from (
  select
    date_trunc('hour', time) as time,
    first_value((data->>'size_b')::int8) over w,
    last_value((data->>'size_b')::int8) over w
  from
    metrics
  where 
    dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_size' and $__timeFilter(time)
  window w as (
     partition by date_trunc('hour', time) order by time rows BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING
  )
) x
group by 1
order by 1;

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("tup_inserted"), 1h) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((ins-ins_lag) * 3600 / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "INSERT",
  avg((upd-upd_lag) * 3600 / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "UPDATE",
  avg((del-del_lag) * 3600 / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "DELETE"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'tup_inserted')::int8 as ins, lag((data->>'tup_inserted')::int8) over w as ins_lag,
          (data->>'tup_updated')::int8 as upd, lag((data->>'tup_updated')::int8) over w as upd_lag,
          (data->>'tup_deleted')::int8 as del, lag((data->>'tup_deleted')::int8) over w as del_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_stats' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where ins >= ins_lag and upd >= upd_lag and del >= del_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Tuple Ins. / Upd. / Del. statistics (1h rate)

targets.query: SELECT ( non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_hit")) / (non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_hit")) + non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_read")))) * 100 FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((hit-hit_lag)::numeric / ((hit-hit_lag) + (read-read_lag)))*100 as "Shared buffers hit ratio",
  avg((roll-roll_lag)::numeric / ((roll-roll_lag) + (comm-comm_lag)))*100 as "TX rollback ratio"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'blks_hit')::int8 as hit, lag((data->>'blks_hit')::int8) over w as hit_lag,
          (data->>'blks_read')::int8 as read, lag((data->>'blks_read')::int8) over w as read_lag,
          (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as roll, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as roll_lag,
          (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as comm, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as comm_lag,
          time
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_stats' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where hit >= hit_lag and read >= read_lag and ((hit-hit_lag) + (read-read_lag) > 0)
group by 1
order by 1

panels.description: Approximate value based on pg_stat_statements total_time / calls

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("total_time"), 1h) / non_negative_derivative(last("calls"), 1h) FROM "stat_statements_calls" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
$__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
avg((tt-tt_lag)::numeric / (c-c_lag)) as "avg_query_runtime"

from (

        select 
          (data->>'total_time')::float8 as tt, lag((data->>'total_time')::float8) over w as tt_lag,
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'stat_statements_calls' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where c > c_lag and tt >= tt_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Avg. query runtime

targets.query: SELECT derivative(mean("xlog_location_b"), 1s) FROM "wal" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((wal-wal_lag) / (etime-lag_etime)) as "WAL rate"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'xlog_location_b')::int8 as wal, lag((data->>'xlog_location_b')::int8) over w as wal_lag,
          extract(epoch from time) as etime,
          lag(extract(epoch from time)) over w as lag_etime,
          time
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'wal' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where wal >= wal_lag and etime - lag_etime > 0
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg(size_b) as "DB Size"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'size_b')::int8 as size_b,
          time
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_size' and $__timeFilter(time)
) x
group by 1
order by 1

targets.query: SELECT mean("numbackends") FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg(nb) as "# Sessions",
  avg(case when dl-dl_lag > 0 then (dl-dl_lag) / (etime - lag_etime) else 0 end) as "Deadlocks (1h rate)"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'numbackends')::int8 as nb,
          (data->>'deadlocks')::int8 as dl, lag((data->>'deadlocks')::int8) over w as dl_lag,
          (extract(epoch from time))::int8 as etime,
          (lag(extract(epoch from time)) over w)::int8 as lag_etime,
          time
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_stats' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where dl >= dl_lag
group by 1
order by 1

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("deadlocks")) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg(case when tb-tb_lag > 0 then (tb-tb_lag) / (etime - lag_etime) else 0 end) as "Temp bytes (1h rate)"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'temp_bytes')::int8 as tb, lag((data->>'temp_bytes')::int8) over w as tb_lag,
          (extract(epoch from time))::int8 as etime,
          (lag(extract(epoch from time)) over w)::int8 as lag_etime,
          time
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_stats' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where tb >= tb_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.description: Transactions per Second / Queries per Second

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("xact_commit"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(last("xact_rollback"), 1s) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg(((c - c_lag) + (r - r_lag)) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "TPS"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'xact_commit')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'xact_commit')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          (data->>'xact_rollback')::int8 as r, lag((data->>'xact_rollback')::int8) over w as r_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'db_stats' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag and r >= r_lag
group by 1
order by 1

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("calls"), 1s) FROM "stat_statements_calls" WHERE $timeFilter AND "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  avg((c - c_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "QPS"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'calls')::int8 as c, lag((data->>'calls')::int8) over w as c_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'stat_statements_calls' and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where c >= c_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: TPS / QPS

targets.query: select sum(scans) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("seq_scan"), 1m) as scans FROM "table_stats" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter AND table_size_b > 10000000 GROUP BY time($__interval), table_full_name fill(none)) GROUP BY time($__interval)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  sum(((scan - scan_lag) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag))*60) as seq_scan
from (
        select 
          (data->>'seq_scan')::int8 as scan, lag((data->>'seq_scan')::int8) over w as scan_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'table_stats' and $__timeFilter(time)
        and (data->>'table_size_b')::int8  > 10000000
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
where scan >= scan_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $__interval),
  lockmode,
  max(lock_count) as lock_count
from (
        select 
          (data->>'count')::int8 as lock_count,
          tag_data->>'lockmode' as lockmode,
          time
        from metrics
        where dbname = '$dbname' and metric = 'locks_mode' and $__timeFilter(time)
        and tag_data->>'lockmode' LIKE '%Exclusive%'
        window w as (order by time)        
) x
group by 1, 2
order by 1, 2

panels.content: Brought to you by:

list.definition: WITH RECURSIVE t(dbname) AS (    SELECT MIN(dbname) AS dbname FROM metrics    UNION    SELECT (SELECT MIN(dbname) FROM metrics WHERE dbname > t.dbname)    FROM t ) SELECT dbname FROM t WHERE dbname NOTNULL ORDER BY 1;
list.name: dbname
list.query: WITH RECURSIVE t(dbname) AS (    SELECT MIN(dbname) AS dbname FROM metrics    UNION    SELECT (SELECT MIN(dbname) FROM metrics WHERE dbname > t.dbname)    FROM t ) SELECT dbname FROM t WHERE dbname NOTNULL ORDER BY 1;
